title: All such constructions shall, however, conform to the prescribed requirement for the provision of essential services, water supply connections, drains, etc
clause_text: All such constructions shall, however, conform to the prescribed requirement for the provision of essential services, water supply connections, drains, etc. to the satisfaction of the Commissioner.

source_pdf.text_snippet: All such constructions shall, however, conform to the prescribed requirement for the provision of essential services, water supply connections, drains, etc. to the satisfaction of the Commissioner.
